title: Vendoir
subtitle: Source & Book Event Vendors with a few taps!
note: App is only available to users in UK
briefing:
Do you want more time to do what matters to you? Are you planning an event and find it stressful to find, book and manage event vendors/suppliers within your budget? 
Vendoir will sort this out for you! Vendoir is the one-stop shop for instantly sourcing, booking, and managing event vendors such as DJs, Photographers, Videographers, Photo booths etc., in just a few taps! 
 
 

# How it works: 
• Tell us your event requirement 
• Get an instant list of vetted vendors 
• Select vendor(s) of your choice based on budget, reviews, location rating and your needs 
• Chat, pay, review all through one platform 
• Save your favourites to your Wishlist to book them again and again 

# Organise your events through Vendoir: 
• Book event vendor service in a few taps 
• Access vetted local vendors 
• Get transparent & instant pricing 
• Book vendor within your budget 
• Chat with vendors in the app 
• Make secure payments with protection 
• Relax, get peace of mind, and have a great time 
• Contact support available to help you 

# Become an event vendor and offer your services through Vendoir: 
• You decide when and where you want to work 
• Manage all bookings with ease 
• Set your rates, time, and earnings 
• Chat with organisers in the app 
• Push notification so you never miss a booking 
• Insight feature to help support your performance 
• We provide the marketing and support you need to grow your business 
• Simply set your schedule and organisers will send you a request to accept their booking or instantly book you 
• Get paid directly through our secure payment system 

# Popular vendor services in Vendoir: 
• Photographers 
• Videographers 
• DJ’s 
• Mc/Host 
• Live band 
• Photo booth
